Features

Source: vignettes/web/features.Rmd
features.Rmd

This page gives an overview over the features currently implemented in the OpenRepGrid R package. Note that the most accurate list of features in always found in the documentation of the R package itself. We try to keep this list up-to-date though.

As the package development is an ongoing process there might be forms of analysis that have not yet been implemented. If you miss any features please make a suggestion for a new feature or for an enhancement or modification of an old features here.

Basics

  • Installation
  • Basic package handling
  • Settings
  • Loading and saving grids
  • Data sets

Analyzing constructs

  • Descriptive statistics
  • Construct correlations
  • Distances between constructs
  • PCA of construct correlations
  • Cluster analysis of constructs

Analyzing elements

  • Descriptive statistics of elements
  • Element correlations
  • Distances between elements
  • Standardized elements distances
  • Cluster analysis of elements

Visualization

  • Bertin plots
  • Biplots

Index measures

  • Intensity index
  • PVAFF
  • Conflicts: based on correlations or distances
  • Implicative dilemmas
  • Dispersion of dependency

Reordering

  • Reorder and align constructs

On this page
